name: Exit Fate
storyline:
In 1545, tensions are at an all time high between the Kirgard kingdom and the State Union of Zelmony. Both powers are interested in possessing Helman Island since its in a pivotal strategic location. While a skirmish over this island is nothing new since it has traded ownership over time, this time the Kirgard kingdom has bigger plans than just taking back the island from Zelmony. This time they plan on a full invasion of Zelmony territory.

Players take on the role of Daniel Vinyard, a Kirgard colonel. He is being sent into the surprise invasion with his childhood friends, the newly appointed General Jovian Knight and Colonel Angel Windsor. However, fate has a surprise in store for them that will challenge the loyalty between these three life long friends.
summary: Exit Fate is a freeware RPG similar to Suikoden, wherein you can recruit seventy-five playable characters. It also bears some similarity to Chrono Cross. note. You can even unlock the menu sets of these two games. The story centers on a man named Daniel, a colonel in the Kirgard Army.
